org.apache.derby.impl.sql.execute

Class GenericAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derby.impl.sql.execute.GenericAggregator

  • class GenericAggregator
extends java.lang.Object
    Adaptor that sits between execution layer and aggregates.
